Hero.visionText: At Codista, we partner with passionate creators, startups, and dreamers to bring digital ideas to life. Be part of the journey.

AboutSection.title: About Us

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To deliver innovative, user-friendly online solutions that empower individuals and businesses, including those without technical expertise, to thrive in the digital landscape.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To create a digital ecosystem where every individual and business, regardless of their background, can seamlessly access and benefit from online services to achieve growth and success.

goal.title: Goal
goal.description: To simplify digital adoption for everyone, enabling businesses of all sizes to enhance their online presence, streamline operations, and achieve sustainable growth.

AboutSection.slogan: The best way to predict the future is to create it

web.heading: Web/Mobile App Development
web.description: Creating sleek, modern web and mobile applications that bring your vision to life.

ecom.heading: E-commerce Solutions
ecom.description: Building robust e-commerce platforms that drive sales and enhance customer experience.

hosting.heading: Hosting & Maintenance
hosting.description: Providing reliable hosting and ongoing maintenance to keep your digital presence running smoothly.

cms.heading: CMS Development
cms.description: Developing custom content management systems that empower you to manage your content effortlessly.

seo.heading: SEO & Digital Marketing
seo.description: Implementing effective SEO strategies and digital marketing campaigns to boost your online visibility.

more.heading: More Services
more.description: For more inquiries, feel free to contact us.

hms.title: Hospital Management System
hms.description: A fullstack hospital management system, to manage patients data , doctors and appointments. Nexj.js for both front-end and back-end , mongoDB with Prisma ORM and next-auth 5.

ecom.title: FlowShop - Complete E-com Platform
ecom.description: A complete e commerce platform using Next js 15, ReactQuery, Tailwindcss, Typescript, and wix API

phone.title: CaseCobra - Custom iPhone Cases
phone.description: A custom iPhone cases builder E-commerce shop with some fancy features

pms.title: CarePulse - A Healthcare Management System
pms.description: A user and admin friendly patient management system that includes patients medical records and much more features.

ai.title: AI Image SaaS - Canva Application
ai.description: A REAL Software-as-a-Service app with AI features and a payments and credits system using the latest tech stack.

3d_portfolio.title: Animated 3D Portfolio Website
3d_portfolio.description: An animated portfolio website prototype, combining Framer Motion animations and Three.js 3D effects..

imd.title: Inventory Management Dashboard
imd.descriptio: A fullstack inventory management dashboard, using next.js for the front-end and node.js for backend along with prisma ORM. Deployed using AWS EC2, S3 and RDS.
